METAD.description: Used to perform metadynamics on one or more collective variables.

RESTRAINT.description: Adds harmonic and/or linear restraints on one or more variables.

UPPER_WALLS.description: Defines a wall for the value of one or more collective variables, limiting values larger than a threshold.

LOWER_WALLS.description: Defines a wall for the value of one or more collective variables, limiting values lower than a threshold.

MOVINGRESTRAINT.description: Adds moving restraints on one or more variables.

PBMETAD.description: Used to perform Parallel Bias metadynamics.

ABMD.description: Adds a ratchet-and-pawl like restraint on one or more variables.

EXTERNAL.description: Calculates the component of the managed force in the direction of an external vector.

OPES_METAD.description: On-the-fly probability enhanced sampling with metadynamics-like target distribution.

OPES_EXPANDED.description: On-the-fly probability enhanced sampling for expanded ensembles.

ECV_UMBRELLAS_LINE.description: Target a multiumbrella ensemble, by combining systems each with a parabolic bias potential at a different location.

ECV_MULTITHERMAL.description: Expand a simulation to sample multiple temperatures.
